moves.9. Bd3: Better to develop the bishop than o-o-o
moves.9... Nd7: Blocking the d-file for the time being
moves.10. O-O-O b6 11. h4: !  I believe this is becoming standard much in the way you would play the Yugoslav attack against the dragon.
